nightlife_activities.name: 622 North
nightlife_activities.description: 622 North is a lively spot known for its diverse food menu, craft beers, and cocktails, offering a vibrant atmosphere for casual dining or a night out. With multiple levels and a spacious patio, it’s a popular place for both locals and students.

nightlife_activities.name: The Milk Parlor
nightlife_activities.description: The Milk Parlor is a quirky, retro-themed bar offering live music, arcade games, and a variety of drinks. It’s a favorite for its laid-back vibe, unique decor, and eclectic entertainment.

nightlife_activities.name: Blacksburg Taphouse
nightlife_activities.description: Blacksburg Taphouse is known for its extensive selection of craft beers and delicious pub fare. Its cozy atmosphere and frequent live music make it a great spot for socializing and enjoying local brews.

nightlife_activities.name: Lyric Theatre
nightlife_activities.description: The Lyric Theatre is a historic, non-profit movie theater showcasing independent films, concerts, and special events. Located in downtown Blacksburg, it’s a cultural hub for movie lovers and performing arts enthusiasts.

nightlife_activities.name: Top of the Stairs (TOTS)
nightlife_activities.description: TOTS is an iconic Blacksburg bar, famous for its signature drink, the Rail, and its rooftop seating. It’s a hotspot for Virginia Tech students looking to enjoy a lively atmosphere and great views of downtown.

nightlife_activities.name: McClain's at First & Main
nightlife_activities.description: McClain’s is a bowling alley, arcade, and sports bar all in one, offering a variety of entertainment options in a fun, casual setting. It’s great for families during the day and a popular nightlife destination in the evening.

nightlife_activities.name: Main Street Inn
nightlife_activities.description: Main Street Inn is a boutique hotel in the heart of downtown Blacksburg, known for its cozy ambiance and proximity to local nightlife. It’s a perfect place to stay for those looking to explore the town’s vibrant bar and restaurant scene.

nightlife_activities.name: Mellow Mushroom
nightlife_activities.description: Mellow Mushroom is a laid-back pizza joint offering creative pizzas, craft beers, and a colorful, artistic atmosphere. It’s a go-to spot for students and locals alike, especially for casual nights out with friends.

nightlife_activities.name: B&B Theatres
nightlife_activities.description: B&B Theatres at First & Main offers a luxury movie-going experience with reclining seats and the latest film releases. It’s perfect for a relaxed night out, combining entertainment with comfort and convenience.

nightlife_activities.name: She-Sha Cafe & Hookah Lounge
nightlife_activities.description: She-Sha Cafe is a unique hookah lounge and café offering a cozy, eclectic environment with tea, coffee, and light bites. Its artistic vibe and hookah offerings make it a favorite for a more relaxed, social nightlife experience.
